articles.description: Two lusty sixes in the final over from India's Hardik Pandya help the tourists to a thrilling six-wicket win at the SCG and an unassailable 2-0 series lead over Australia.
articles.content: Daniel Sams snared the prized scalp of Virat Kohli but got hit for two sixes by Hardik Pandya, as India claimed a thrilling final-over victory against Australia in Sunday night's Twenty20 internation… [+2992 chars]
